td.content: shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site
shows a small area of gastric fundal mucosa has loss of rugal folds

td.content: s:a M aged 43 Ys presents with increased moderate vomiting, moderate weakness and moderate weight loss over several months over 4 months. o:Height 76 in, Weight 174 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

s:pt presents without complaints. patient denies vomiting, weakness and weight loss over several months. pt is a 43 yr old M. o:Height 75 in, Weight 167 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:a male aged 44 yrs presents with 7 days history of moderate weakness, moderate vomiting and moderate weight loss over several months. occasional EtOH denies any smoking o:Height 75 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt C/O moderate weight loss over several months, moderate weakness and moderate vomiting. NKDA. he is a 44 yr old white male. o:Height 75 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.
